document_data.mainbody:
athira Melarn was an Eilistraeean sword dancer from Ched Nasad who wielded the Crescent Blade.
Mathira Melarn was a member of the Ched Nasadan House Melarn. There was a broken bust of Mathira in House Melarns great hall. At some point, she joined the worshipers of Eilistraee and became a sword dancer. She wielded the Crescent Blade, a sword said to be created by Eilistraee for the purpose of destroying Lolth.
Mathira was last seen in Harrowdale, making her way to Black Feather Bridge.
